name: Water and its role in nature
description:
Water is an essential element of life. Without it, there would be no people, animals and plants. Even microscopic bacteria simply cannot survive without this amazing liquid. But it is good that there is more than enough water on the planet. The Pacific Ocean alone is larger than all the continents combined.


In this presentation, I will tell and show how important water is in nature in general and in the life of every person in particular.


You can contact me by mail ritetus@gmail.com. In the title, write the word «PRESENTATION».
